original_text: And the prince in the midst of them, when they go in, shall go in; and when they go forth, shall go forth.
korean_text: 군주가 무리 가운데에 있어서 그들이 들어올 때에 들어오고 그들이 나갈 때에 나갈지니라

sentences.original_text: And the prince in the midst of them
when they go in, shall go in;
and when they go forth, shall go forth.
